hero.subtitle:
Fintech | Blockchain | Payments | Stablecoins | Web 2 <—> Web3 Integration

Strategic partnerships and business development leader bridging traditional finance and blockchain ecosystems. Currently driving Web2 and Web3 client acquisition, partnership integrations, and infrastructure expansion at KIMA Network. Expert in DeFi protocols, cross-chain solutions, and enterprise blockchain adoption with a track record of building 1M+ communities across multiple chains.

kima_bullets: Promoted internally from Marketing & Community Management to Business Development based on performance and strategic impact.
Driving Web2 and Web3 client acquisition, onboarding, and integrations for KIMA’s cross-chain payment infrastructure.
Established and managed 100+ strategic partnerships across fintech, DeFi, and blockchain ecosystems.
Acting as a bridge between Web2 enterprises and Web3 protocols to enable seamless blockchain adoption.
Scaled and managed a 2.5M+ global community across multiple platforms.
Represented KIMA in demos, AMAs, conferences, and negotiations.
kima_strategic_bullets: Led end-to-end business development strategy, identifying, onboarding, and managing strategic partners across Web2 and Web3 ecosystems.
Secured 100+ strategic partnerships that expanded market presence and accelerated business growth.
Established partnerships across wallets, exchanges, infrastructure providers, dApps, payment processors, and ecosystem partners.
Built long-term relationships with founders, BD heads, and ecosystem leaders to unlock co-marketing and revenue opportunities.
multifarm_bullets: Delivered and marketed 5+ DeFi products across Linea, zkSync, Scroll, and Solana.
Built 100k+ community within one month for HorizonDEX launch.
Executed go-to-market strategies for DeFi protocols and yield platforms.
crowdfund_bullets: Led operations for a crypto-focused DAO VC investing across DeFi, Layer 1/2, NFTs, and Metaverse projects.
Conducted due diligence, market research, and investment analysis for early-stage Web3 startups.
Managed internal operations, reporting, and process optimization for DAO governance.
mystery_bullets: Managed and nurtured vibrant community ecosystem with consistent active engagement.
Fostered genuine connections and cultivated sense of belonging among community members.
Excelled as content creator and partnership manager for crypto projects.
additional_bullets: Led the publication of a digital magazine focused on Crypto & NFT, overseeing content creation, editing, and deep analytical reports.
Curated "hidden gems" and thought leadership content that served as a valuable resource for industry insights and project updates.
Enhanced organizational reputation and brand awareness through strategic marketing of digital publications.
Actively monitored industry trends, technological advancements, and regulatory developments in the Cryptocurrency and Web3 space.
Leveraged ongoing research and knowledge acquisition to ensure informed investment decisions and maintain a competitive edge.

testimonials.name: Alex Johnson
testimonials.quote: Arpit's strategic vision and network were instrumental in our successful launch. He bridges the gap between technical and business requirements effortlessly.

testimonials.name: Sarah Lee
testimonials.quote: Working with Arpit was a game-changer. His deep understanding of both Web2 and Web3 ecosystems helped us navigate complex partnerships with ease.

testimonials.name: Tomer Warscher Nuni
testimonials.quote: Arpit Dedication to the work is phenominal and trustworthy team leader.
